Package org.csstudio.platform.internal.simpledal

Interface Summary
AbstractConnector.IRunnable Runnable which is used to forward events to process variable value listeners.
 

Class Summary
AbstractConnector Base class for connectors.
AbstractProcessVariableConnectionServiceTest Test class for ProcessVariableConnectionService.
DalCacheBugTest  
DalConnector DAL Connectors are connected to the control system via the DAL API.
LocalConnector Local Connectors are connected to a simulated channels that live in the local JVM.
ProcessVariableConnectionService Standard implementation of IProcessVariableConnectionService.
ProcessVariableConnectionServiceTest Test class for ProcessVariableConnectionService.
ProcessVariableConnectionServiceTestForASyncOperations Test implementation for ProcessVariableConnectionService which tests the asynchronous single get operations.
ProcessVariableConnectionServiceTestForRegisterOperations Test implementation for ProcessVariableConnectionService which tests the asynchronous single get operations.
ProcessVariableConnectionServiceTestForSyncOperations Test implementation for ProcessVariableConnectionService which tests the asynchronous single get operations.
